title: Can technologies help us to forget memories? - Quora

response.answer_text: I already answered a question " how can I forget my past memories?" You are advised to go through which is present in my account still. However, I will add a few things pertinent to your question. The format of the question speaks volumes about the stress the modern way of life is imposing on people. A genaration before no one ever thought of forgetting anything but were striving to improve the memory. This indirectly shows how the modern technologies like smart phones, intrent, social media and many other gadgets helped and even compelling us to gather so much trash called information and knowledge? Now that we are looking for ways to unlearn , and funnily searching for some other technology to undo the mischief. Such technology may come in future and the robot with AI with that technology may make all of us empty headed. Beware ! Don't look for outside technology to achieve your desire to get rid of the painful trash , the means to achieve it are already in you if you care to know. Go through the advice given in 1st para - you will succeed— good luck.
